name: html5 background video builder
description: This is a simple jquery based plugin that helps in building a responsive background html5 video. Placing background videos in the first fold section or any other place is a common and popular trend in website. This plugin helps simply the process.

name: click image play youtube video
description: This is a javascript/jquery plugin that can be easily integrated into your web app. The main purpose of this plugin is to provide a simple yet effect user interface, in the form of an overlay, to help play youtube embeded videos, based on a click event.

name: no fuss smooth scroll jquery plugin
description: If you like seeing smooth scrolling animations on your website, then you are at the right place! This plugin has an absolutely easy installation and implemenation process for your website.
